techmeme.title: Don Lemon sues Elon Musk and X, arguing Musk refused to pay him after a content deal with X fell apart; Lemon did not sign a formal contract (Kate Conger/New York Times)
Sources: the UK told tech companies the AI bill will make existing voluntary agreements legally binding and the AI Safety Institute into an Arm's Length Body (Financial Times)
The CISA names Lisa Einstein as its first chief AI officer; Einstein has been a senior adviser at the agency since last year and helped craft CISA's AI roadmap (Sam Sabin/Axios)
The European Commission unconditionally approves HPE's $14B takeover of networking gear maker Juniper Networks after finding no competition concerns (Bart Meijer/Reuters)
Roblox reports Q2 revenue up 31% YoY to $894M, bookings up 22% YoY to $995M, a $206M net loss, average DAUs up 21% YoY to 79.5M, projects Q3 bookings above est. (Cecilia D'Anastasio/Bloomberg)
